standard_terms: 1. Payment terms: Payments are due within 30 days of invoice. 2. Termination: Either party may terminate with 30 days' notice.
previous_data: In the previous negotiation with Company X, they requested a 60-day payment term extension, which was accepted. Company Y requested an exclusive distribution clause, but it was rejected.

current_context.concerns_goals: We aim to shorten payment terms without compromising supplier relationships.
